title: E328 Liam Payne Wants To Fight Justin Bieber & KSI, Reveals Why One Direction Broke Up
itunes:title: Liam Payne Wants To Fight Justin Bieber & KSI, Reveals Why One Direction Broke Up
description:
Pop icon & former One Direction member, Liam Payne, joins the boys to reveal *exclusive* One Direction details (craziest guy, fighting over women, how it started, why it ended), ex-wife Cheryl, calling out Gigi Hadid & Zayn, fighting Justin Bieber & KSI, life as a father, fighting Quavo at a carnival & more…

SUBSCRIBE TO THE PODCAST ► https://www.youtube.com/impaulsive

Visit https://www.manscaped.com/ and use the discount code LOGAN at checkout #ad

ADD US ON: INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/impaulsiveshow/

3:20 Carnival Fight With Quavo

6:29 How One Direction Started Exclusive

1:01:44 Impressions: Jack Sparrow, Bane, Joker

1:04:39 Boxing Justin Bieber

1:08:41 Toasted Turds
